City Council (Board of Directors)
=================================

The Ferris City Council, serving as the Board of Directors, plays a crucial role in the governance of the city. The Council is dedicated to ensuring that Ferris remains a thriving, safe, and prosperous community through effective leadership and strategic oversight.

The City Council's responsibilities include:

* Crafting, reviewing, and approving ordinances and resolutions that address the needs and priorities of the community.
* Reviewing and approving the city's budget to ensure fiscal responsibility and the efficient allocation of resources.
* Serving as the voice of the residents by addressing concerns, facilitating public engagement, and ensuring transparent communication between the city government and its citizens.

The City Council works collaboratively with the City Manager and other key stakeholders to ensure that Ferris remains a vibrant and responsive city. While the Council focuses on governance and strategic direction, the City Manager's Office is responsible for the day-to-day operations and implementation of Council-approved policies.

1. Set the Standard for a Safe and Secure City

### [FAQs](https://www.ferristexas.gov/Faq.aspx?TID=16)

[What is the role of the City Council?](https://www.ferristexas.gov/157/City-Council-Board-of-Directors#)
:   The City Council, acting as the Board of Directors, is responsible for setting policies, establishing strategic priorities, and guiding the overall governance of Ferris, Texas. They focus on long-term goals and fiscal oversight, while the City Manager handles day-to-day operations.

[How can I contact the City Council?](https://www.ferristexas.gov/157/City-Council-Board-of-Directors#)
:   You can contact the City Council by calling 972-544-2110 or ​emailing the City Manager​. For in-person visits, meetings are held at the Historic Ferris Scout House on the third Tuesday of every month.

[How does the City Council support economic development?](https://www.ferristexas.gov/157/City-Council-Board-of-Directors#)
:   The City Council supports economic development by approving policies and initiatives that create a favorable environment for business growth. They collaborate with the City Manager and the Ferris Economic Development Corporation to ensure strategic alignment and effective implementation.

[View All FAQs](https://www.ferristexas.gov/Faq.aspx?TID=16)
